summary: This texture mod changes the appearance of furnishing
descriptionHtml:
Washed Skyrim

Do you like... good furniture? Why not, this is so cool!

Ver 0.3
Author: Ri4

Description
This texture mod changes the appearance of furnishing

What color do you like? Take it!

1. Cherry wood
2. Oak wood
3. Dark walnut
4. Blue Mountain Oak (rare plant Skyrim)

(look at the pictures)

______________________________

!!! Attention !!!


Each file contains three types of textures: 512, 1024, 2048 hi rez
Choose your favorite.

______________________________

Installation
Use NMM or Move the files to your data directory

Uninstall
Use NMM or Delete the files from your date directory


===========================================================================
All parts of the \"Washed Skyrim\"
===========================================================================


[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7634]Washed Skyrim - Bags and Basket (ver 0.3)[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8885]Washed Skyrim - Bar counter[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7791]Washed Skyrim - Crates[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7540]Washed Skyrim - Dresser (ver 0.3)[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8024]Washed Skyrim - Dribs and drabs[/URL]
